summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code Subsections 25.08.520E & F (Parts of Ordinance 106360, s 504 as amended by Ordinance 108552 s 2) to provide for noise monitoring services, and to delete the requirement of a deposit for insuring compliance with the sound limits; and amending SMC Subsection 25.08.540A (Ordinance 106360, s 602A as amended) to restrict an exemption to unamplified sound.
